content:
This dir contains everything from raw data to ngsplots for Nabila's ChIP-seq project A

There was not any Excel summary listing all the samples when I took over from Elmira

P01 was the ctrl for P02 - P09
P10 was the ctrl for P11 - P18

The analysis follows:
https://cbcl.ics.uci.edu/public_data/shilab/ChIPseq_szang_20160205/ChIP_seq_pipeline.txt

The outcome (ngsplots) can be found at:
https://cbcl.ics.uci.edu/public_data/shilab/ChIPseq_szang_20160205/Nabila_A/ngsplot_wGenelist/
